scripts.dev: mkdir -p logs && source .env && vite dev --port $PORT --force 2>&1 | tee logs/server.log
scripts.test:integration: pnpm build && pnpm vitest --config test/integration/vitest.config.ts run
scripts.clean: pnpm clean:node && pnpm clean:wrangler && pnpm clean:etc
scripts.d1:migrate:list:PRODUCTION: wrangler d1 migrations list tca-d1-production --env production --remote
scripts.d1:migrate:apply:PRODUCTION: wrangler d1 migrations apply tca-d1-production --env production --remote
scripts.refs:shadcn: rm -rf refs/shadcn && mkdir -p refs/shadcn && curl -L https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/archive/refs/tags/shadcn@3.7.0.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/shadcn --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-form: rm -rf refs/tan-form && mkdir -p refs/tan-form && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/form/archive/refs/tags/@tanstack/react-form@1.27.7.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-form --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:base-ui: rm -rf refs/base-ui && mkdir -p refs/base-ui && curl -L https://github.com/mui/base-ui/archive/refs/tags/v1.1.0.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/base-ui --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:agents: rm -rf refs/agents && mkdir -p refs/agents && curl -L https://github.com/cloudflare/agents/archive/refs/tags/agents@0.4.1.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/agents --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:agents-starter: rm -rf refs/agents-starter && mkdir -p refs/agents-starter && curl -L https://github.com/cloudflare/agents-starter/archive/refs/heads/main.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/agents-starter --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:ai-elements: rm -rf refs/ai-elements && mkdir -p refs/ai-elements && curl -L https://github.com/vercel/ai-elements/archive/refs/tags/ai-elements@1.8.0.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/ai-elements --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-router: rm -rf refs/tan-router && mkdir -p refs/tan-router && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/router/archive/refs/tags/v1.156.0.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-router --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-query: rm -rf refs/tan-query && mkdir -p refs/tan-query && curl -sL https://github.com/TanStack/query/archive/refs/tags/@tanstack/react-query@5.90.20.tar.gz | tar -xzC refs/tan-query --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:tan-start: rm -rf refs/tan-start && mkdir -p refs/tan-start && curl -L https://github.com/TanStack/router/archive/refs/tags/v1.156.0.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/tan-start --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:better-auth: rm -rf refs/better-auth && mkdir -p refs/better-auth && curl -L https://github.com/better-auth/better-auth/archive/refs/tags/v1.4.17.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/better-auth --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:cloudflare-docs: rm -rf refs/cloudflare-docs && mkdir -p refs/cloudflare-docs && curl -L https://github.com/cloudflare/cloudflare-docs/archive/refs/heads/production.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/cloudflare-docs --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:cloudflare-templates: rm -rf refs/cloudflare-templates && mkdir -p refs/cloudflare-templates && curl -L https://github.com/cloudflare/templates/archive/refs/tags/v8.0.0.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/cloudflare-templates --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:ai: rm -rf refs/ai && mkdir -p refs/ai && curl -L https://github.com/vercel/ai/archive/refs/tags/ai@6.0.49.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/ai --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:aws4fetch: rm -rf refs/aws4fetch && mkdir -p refs/aws4fetch && curl -L https://github.com/mhart/aws4fetch/archive/refs/tags/v1.0.20.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/aws4fetch --strip-components=1
scripts.refs:zod: rm -rf refs/zod && mkdir -p refs/zod && curl -L https://github.com/colinhacks/zod/archive/refs/tags/v4.3.3.tar.gz | tar -xz -C refs/zod --strip-components=1
scripts.clone:links: [ ! -e refs ] && ln -s ../tanstack-cloudflare-agent/refs refs; [ ! -e todo.md ] && ln -s ../tanstack-cloudflare-agent/todo.md todo.md
